data.eml:eml: Systematic review of the firefly genus Amydetes Illiger, 1807 (Coleoptera: Lampyridae), with description of 13 new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silveira, Luiz Felipe Lima Da, Mermudes, José Ricardo M. (2014): Systematic review of the firefly genus Amydetes Illiger, 1807 (Coleoptera: Lampyridae), with description of 13 new species. Zootaxa 3765 (3): 201-248, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3765.3.1
